Welcome to AI Adventure Academy!

You are 5th grader at a new school and today is your first day! Saturday is your birthday and you need to make as many friends as you can at recess this week so you have people to invite to your pool party.

Each day of the week, you'll have 60 minutes of playtime - but every little action eats into this recess time.

To begin you will need to pick 5 items to take with you to school. Choose wisely, these items could help you make some friends!

Items:
1. box of chalks
2. Ouija board
3. rubber duck
4. playing cards
5. bag of jelly beans
6. a jump rope
7. a big cookie
8. an action figure
9. a kite
10. a soccer ball
